abstract: Markets fell slightly on Wednesday as early optimism over a $13.5 billion stock offering by Bank of America faded in the afternoon, leading some investors to cash in their gains before the holiday weekend.
snippet: Markets fell slightly on Wednesday as early optimism over a $13.5 billion stock offering by Bank of America faded in the afternoon, leading some investors to cash in their gains before the holiday weekend.
lead_paragraph: Markets fell slightly on Wednesday as early optimism over a $13.5 billion stock offering by Bank of America faded in the afternoon, leading some investors to cash in their gains before the holiday weekend.

headline.main: Wall Street Stumbles as Day Nears End

abstract: Bank of America wants to pay back $45 billion in bail-out funds by the end of the year, accelerated by a program to raise capital, The Financial Times reported.
snippet: Bank of America wants to pay back $45 billion in bail-out funds by the end of the year, accelerated by a program to raise capital, The Financial Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America wants to pay back $45 billion in bail-out funds by the end of the year, accelerated by a program to raise capital, The Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Bank of America Seeks to Repay Billions by 2010, Report Says
